title: Using ChatGPT For Free Without an Account: 6 Things to Know

steps.title: You still need to log in in some markets.
steps.content: You still need to log in in some markets. OpenAI announced that they will start allowing users to access ChatGPT without signing up starting on April 1st, 2024. They said they will gradually be rolling out this service to select markets. Eventually, it should be available to everyone. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You can access ChatGPT from the OpenAI website.
steps.content: You can access ChatGPT from the OpenAI website. All you need to do is go to https://chatgpt.com/ in a web browser. You can start chatting instantly without having to sign up for an account or log in as long as it is available in your area.

steps.title: Yes, you don't need an email address or password.
steps.content: Yes, you don't need an email address or password. However, OpenAI can still use your conversation and prompts to train the model to make it better for other users. However, you can opt out of this feature. OpenAI still may monitor your conversations to make sure they comply with their content policy.

steps.title: You can opt out in the Settings menu.
steps.content: You can opt out in the Settings menu. This is true whether or not you have an account. Click the question mark (?) icon in the lower-right corner. Then click Settings . Click the toggle switch next to "Improve the model for everyone" to turn it off.

steps.title: Yes, many features are not available unless you sign up for an account.
steps.content: Yes, many features are not available unless you sign up for an account. Features, such as the ability to save and share conversations will not be available to those who do not sign up for an account. Additionally, you will not be able to use custom instructions . Furthermore, OpenAI will restrict a wider range of content for users that don't sign up for an account, blocking a wider range of categories from prompts and content generation. [2] X Research source

steps.title: It depends on your needs.
steps.content: It depends on your needs. If you use ChatGPT frequently and would like the ability to save and share chats, as well as use custom instructions, then it is worth it to sign up for an account and log in. It doesn't cost anything to sign up for an account, though you can subscribe to ChatGPT Plus for $20 a month and get even more features. However, if you rarely use ChatGPT or just want to see how it works, you can use it without signing up for an account.
